comments:

This is the source of the problem (Mylar did not start properly):

Root exception:
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org/eclipse/mylar/internal/tasklist/MylarTaskListPlugin
at
org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaPlugin.start(BugzillaPlugin.java:119)

Please follow the instructions in the FAQ for troubleshooting the install, and please let me know how it goes in case anything in those instructions could be improved.

  http://www.eclipse.org/mylar/doc/faq.php#install-failure
Thank you. Worked once I took the time to read the FAQ. Just a bit to eager to get it up and running since the Linux tooltip bug was fixed.
